title: inda varamaruLa
sahitya:
inda varamaruLa unakkenna taDai ayyA end varam kETTavarkkum Iyum koDaikkayyA


anupallavi

  candiranaip-pOl unran shaDaiyirukka vENDEnE shankaranE unraniru tALiNaiyE vENDUm enakku


caraNam    sanga nidhi paduma nidhi tamaiyaruLak-kETTEnO daraNiyellAm oru kuDaikkuL tAngu tiram kETTEnO
bhangamillA vAzh nATkaL pala kOTi kETTEnO pada malarai ennuLLattil bhaktiyuDan Endi nirkkum
